properties.abstract: The first pumptrack in the BÃ¼ndner Herrschaft. Ideally located below the school and sports facilities, it fits perfectly into the environment. The asphalt plant with a length of 210 m impresses with a variety of combination possibilities as well as a special beginnings.
properties.description:
Big and small experience on this pumptrack a lot of driving fun. The complex is accessible by bike, scooter, inline skates and skateboard. Due to the proximity to the school and sports facilities, children and youngsters are the users of this facility, but it is also attractive for professionals.

The pumptrack consists of two separate, combinable loops. In times of great visitor interest, this allows beginners to concentrate on the small lap undisturbed, while the experienced riders will have fun on the bigger one. Of course, the two loops are connected to one another and can also be driven together.

Paid parking is adjacent to the facility.
